heading.sm: E na o ē ua valaaulia

summary.en: On the night of our fiafia, please be aware that you will only be admitted if you have completed the RSVP form. Please do not extend this invitation to others, as this is not an open invite event. Only brothers and sisters invited by the friends on the About Us page may attend.
summary.sm: E mo lo outou silafia, e na o I latou ua faao’o mai a latou RSVP forms e faaulufaleina I lea po. Faamolemole o lenei faatasiga e mo na o I latou ua valaaulia, e lē o se fiafia fa’alaua’itele. O lea ua matou talosaga atu ai, e lē mafai ona e valaauliaina se isi e te masani ai. E na o uso ma tuafafine e matou te valaauliaina e taliaina I lea po. Mo ni faamatalaga atili, faamolemole taga'i ane I le itulau O ai Matou.

summary.en: Join us for a beautiful night, full of encouragement, entertainment and laughs :)
summary.sm: Auai ma i matou mo se po matagofie, e tumu i faamalosiauga ma faafiafiaga :)

summary.en: Please, we encourage you to join us for a wonderful evening, as we gather together with brothers and sisters from around the world!
summary.sm: Faamolemole, e faalaeiauina outou, tatou faatasi i lenei po matagofie, ma o tatou uso ma tuafafine i le lalolagi aoao!

summary.en: Please, we encourage you to join us for a wonderful evening, as we gather together with brothers and sisters from around the world!
summary.sm: Faamolemole, e faalaeiauina outou, tatou faatasi i lenei po matagofie, ma o tatou uso ma tuafafine i le lalolagi aoao!
